short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genuine wallet to get visibility and control over cryptocrruncies and blockchain assets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KLAATOO is a multi-chain wallet that can store, receive, and transfer various digital assets issued in different blockchains in the wallet.
Users have complete control over various digital assets with a single private key in KLAATOO, and no one, including developers, can access the user's wallet.
Users can monitor and easily manage the value of digital assets in real time and can access KLAATOO from any device connected to the Internet.
